thread.title: Alicia Fleming
thread.title_full: R&G Brenner Income Tax reviewed by Alicia Fleming

author: Alicia Fleming
title: Alicia Fleming
text: Kevin Dolkhani has helped me and my family with our taxes for several years and he always does an excellent job. This year, I had a problem with an administrative staff member at R&G Brenner. Once I contacted Kevin, he immediately stepped in and solved the problem. Kevin is an asset to R&G Brenner.
